verses.verse: And <WG2532> the<WG2250> third<WG5154> day<WG2250> there was<WG1096> a marriage<WG1062> in<WG1722> Cana<WG2580> of Galilee<WG1056>; and<WG2532> the mother<WG3384> of Jesus<WG2424> was<WG2258> there<WG1563>:
and <WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> also<WG2532> was bidden<WG2564>, and<WG2532> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101>, to<WG1519> the marriage<WG1062>.
And <WG2532> when the wine<WG3631> failed<WG5302>, the mother<WG3384> of Jesus<WG2424> saith<WG3004> unto<WG4314> him<WG846>, They have<WG2192> no<WG3756> wine<WG3631>.
And Jesus<WG2424> saith<WG3004> unto her<WG846>, Woman<WG1135>, what<WG5101> have<WG2532> I<WG1698> to do with<WG2532> thee<WG4671>? mine<WG3450> hour<WG5610> is<WG2240> not yet<WG3768> come<WG2240>.
His <WG846> mother<WG3384> saith<WG3004> unto the servants<WG1249>, Whatsoever5100, Leviticus2 he saith<WG3004> unto you<WG5213>, do it<WG4160>.

Now <WG1161> there were<WG2258> six<WG1803> waterpots<WG5201> of stone<WG3035> set<WG2749> there<WG1563> after the Jews<WG2453>' manner of<WG2596> purifying<WG2512>, containing<WG5562> two<WG1417> or<WG2228> three<WG5140> firkins<WG3355> apiece<WG303>.
Jesus <WG2424> saith<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, Fill<WG1072> the waterpots<WG5201> with water<WG5204>. And<WG2532> they filled<WG1072> them<WG846> up to<WG2193> the brim<WG507>.
And <WG2532> he saith<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, Draw out<WG501> now<WG3568>, and<WG2532> bear<WG5342> unto the ruler of the feast<WG755>. And<WG2532> they bare it<WG5342>.

And <WG1161> when<WG5613> the ruler of the feast<WG755> tasted<WG1089> the water<WG5204> now become<WG1096> wine<WG3631>, and<WG2532> knew<WG1492> not<WG3756> whence<WG4159> it was<WG2076> (but<WG1161> the servants<WG1249> that had drawn<WG501> the water<WG5204> knew<WG1492>), the ruler of the feast<WG755> calleth<WG5455> the bridegroom<WG3566>,

and <WG2532> saith<WG3004> unto him<WG846>, Every<WG3956> man<WG444> setteth<WG5087> on first<WG4412> the good<WG2570> wine<WG3631>; and<WG2532> when<WG3752> men have drunk<WG3184> freely<WG5119>, then that which is worse<WG1640>: thou<WG4771> hast kept<WG5083> the<WG3631> good<WG2570> wine<WG3631> until<WG2193> now<WG737>.

This <WG3778> beginning<WG746> of his signs<WG4592> did<WG4160> Jesus<WG2424> in<WG1722> Cana<WG2580> of Galilee<WG1056>, and<WG2532> manifested<WG5319> his<WG846> glory<WG1391>; and<WG2532> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101> believed<WG4100> on<WG1519> him<WG846>.

After <WG3326> this<WG5124> he went down<WG2597> to<WG1519> Capernaum<WG2584>, he<WG846>, and<WG2532> his<WG846> mother<WG3384>, and<WG2532> his<WG846> brethren<WG80>, and<WG2532> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101>; and<WG2532> there<WG1563> they abode<WG3306> not<WG3756> many<WG4183> days<WG2250>.
And <WG2532> the passover<WG3957> of the Jews<WG2453> was<WG2258> at hand<WG1451>, and<WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> went up<WG305> to<WG1519> Jerusalem<WG2414>.

And <WG2532> he found<WG2147> in<WG1722> the temple<WG2411> those that sold<WG4453> oxen<WG1016> and<WG2532> sheep<WG4263> and<WG2532> doves<WG4058>, and<WG2532> the changers of money<WG2773> sitting<WG2521>:

and <WG2532> he made<WG4160> a scourge<WG5416> of<WG1537> cords<WG4979>, and cast<WG1544> all<WG3956> out<WG1537> of the temple<WG2411>, both<WG5037> the sheep<WG4263> and<WG5037> the oxen<WG1016>; and<WG2532> he poured out<WG1632> the changers<WG2855>' money<WG2772>, and<WG2532> overthrew<WG390> their tables<WG5132>;

and <WG2532> to them that sold<WG4453> the doves<WG4058> he said<WG2036>, Take<WG142> these things<WG5023> hence<WG1782>; make<WG4160> not<WG3361> my<WG3450> Father<WG3962>'s house<WG3624> a house<WG3624> of merchandise<WG1712>.
<WG1161> His<WG846> disciples<WG3101> remembered<WG3415> that<WG3754> it was<WG2076> written<WG1125>, Zeal<WG2205> for<WG3624> thy<WG4675> house<WG3624> shall eat<WG2719> me<WG3165> up<WG2719>.

The Jews<WG2453> therefore<WG3767> answered<WG611> and<WG2532> said<WG2036> unto him<WG846>, What<WG5101> sign<WG4592> showest thou<WG1166> unto us<WG2254>, seeing that<WG3754> thou doest<WG4160> these things<WG5023>?

Jesus <WG2424> answered<WG611> and<WG2532> said<WG2036> unto them<WG846>, Destroy<WG3089> this<WG5126> temple<WG3485>, and<WG2532> in<WG1722> three<WG5140> days<WG2250> I will raise<WG1453> it<WG846> up<WG1453>.

The Jews<WG2453> therefore<WG3767> said<WG2036>, Forty<WG5062> and<WG2532> six<WG1803> years<WG2094> was<WG3618> this<WG3778> temple<WG3485> in building<WG3618>, and<WG2532> wilt<WG1453> thou<WG4771> raise<WG1453> it up<WG846> in<WG1722> three<WG5140> days<WG2250>?
But <WG1161> he<WG1565> spake<WG3004> of<WG4012> the temple<WG3485> of<WG4983> his<WG846> body<WG4983>.

When <WG3753> therefore<WG3767> he was raised<WG1453> from<WG1537> the dead<WG3498>, his<WG846> disciples<WG3101> remembered<WG3415> that<WG3754> he spake<WG3004> this<WG5124>; <WG846> and<WG2532> they believed<WG4100> the scripture<WG1124>, and<WG2532> the word<WG3056> which<WG3739> Jesus<WG2424> had said<WG2036>.

Now <WG1161> when<WG5613> he was<WG2258> in<WG1722> Jerusalem<WG2414> at<WG1722> the passover<WG3957>, during<WG1722> the feast<WG1859>, many<WG4183> believed<WG4100> on<WG1519> his<WG846> name<WG3686>, beholding<WG2334> his signs<WG4592> which<WG3739> he<WG846> did<WG4160>.
But1161, 846 Jesus<WG2424> did<WG4100> not<WG3756> trust<WG4100> himself<WG1438> unto them<WG846>, for that<WG1223> he<WG846> knew<WG1097> all men<WG3956>,

and <WG2532> because<WG3754> he needed<WG5532> not<WG3756> that<WG2443> any<WG5100> one should bear witness<WG3140> concerning<WG4012> man<WG444>; for<WG1063> he<WG846> himself knew<WG1097> what<WG5101> was<WG2258> in<WG1722> man<WG444>.
